lyrics:
Come into the circle of God’s infinite kindness
And then you will have reason to jubilate.
Listen to the wonders God’s ineffable mercy has wrought
For the good of his saints.

Open up my vision, Lord, that I may see
That never-ending torrent of Your love for me.

Come into the sunshine of God’s tender forgiveness,
And then you will be shining throughout your days.
Listen to the story of God’s wonderful healing
In those who return to His ways.

Come in to the love (2)
Welcome to the love of the Lord, of the Lord.
